document.full_text: the mavericks are heading back to the n.b.a. finals, thanks to yet another a fourth quarter rally and strong performance from dirk nowitzki.
document.title: mavericks 100, thunder 96: dallas rallies to return to finals
lines_and_colors: the mavericks are heading back to the n.b.a. finals, thanks to yet another a fourth quarter rally and strong performance from dirk nowitzki.
